This vignette explores reconfiguring the mCode to OMOP Mappings. 

```{r}
library(mOMOP)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
complete_map <-
list(CANCER_STAGING, 
          GENOMICS, 
          ICD10CM, 
          LOINC, 
          SNOMED, 
          SPECIMEN, 
          UNITS_OF_MEASUREMENT) %>%
  map(mutate_all, as.character) %>%
  bind_rows()
complete_map
```

```{r}
value_sets <-
  complete_map %>%
  rubix::split_by(col = value_set_name)
value_sets
```
